actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent and to authorize the production of documents by Philip Q. Cohen in the case of Moreno v. Small Business Administration, et al.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Philip Q. Cohen, a Senate employee, in the case of Moreno v. Small Business Administration, et al. Authorizes such employee to testify and produce documents in such case, except concerning matters which are privileged from disclosure.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent and to authorize the production of documents by Philip Q. Cohen in the case of Moreno v. Small Business Administration, et al.
